transcripts.text: We're here at Netroots Nation live in Philadelphia in 2019.  I am here with Janet Diaz.  She is the first Latina ever to run for state senate in Pennsylvania which is a sad reality but very exciting.
Yes it is.  I'm very excited and I'm ready to run.
Can you talk about the issues that are facing people in Pennsylvania?

I think affordable health care because I knocked on doors already and There are people that are only working part-time and they don't have health care.  I'm very strong and passionate about supporting our farmers that are currently auctioning off their land.  And I do believe that keeping our produce here in Pennsylvania is very important for us.
Can you talk about the importance of being the first Latina farmer?  running in this state?  It is shocking in a state this large.

Well, it's important to me, first of all, because I think that a lot of Latinas have been pushed away and pushed aside.  I mean, you have to think 54% is less that the Latina make versus a white man.  So not only to set the stage, I just want to pave the path for Latinas to run in the future.  And that's my goal.
You've also come out of a group with the support of a group called Emerge.  Can you tell the viewers.  what is Emerge and how they've helped?
Well, Emerge Pennsylvania is a group that actually trains women to run.  And I love Emerge because I ran for city council and I actually ran unendorsed and I won with the help of Emerge.
In the Democratic Party or outside?
So how can people, how can women who want to run or who are, you know, everyone's encouraging women to run, how can they do it if they're sitting at home watching and thinking maybe they'll do it?

All you have to do is go to the website and actually fill out the application and go through the vetting process and they can get in.  I mean, I did it.  I didn't expect to actually be accepted.  When I was accepted, I was so happy.
This is really exciting, and I wish you well in your candidacy.  Thank you.  Janet Diaz, what district are you running in?
That's wonderful.  Congratulations, and I hope to congratulate you on a win.
You're watching ACTV's coverage of Netroots Nation 2019.  We'll be back.
